name: Overtale (Patchwork)
description:
Yes my dear friends, this game has multiplayer, chat functions and more.

The Story is simple: Find the magic banana that grants wishes!

The evil neckbeards are however after it and will do anything to defeat you and tour friends.

I would like to thank Pheonix KageDesu for his amazing plugin to make this multiplayer experience possible, along with rpg maker and Visustella for their plugins!

**Disclaimer** The game is a rough prototype/alpha the game will be updated frequently as much as I can.

**Online notice** Treat others as you want to be treated online, there are no Game Master tools to kick people out if they are rude or nasty.
